welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Osthofen, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming town known for its rich history, delicious wine, and picturesque streets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Osthofen has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, handling most of the international and non-Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and planned to open in 2023, Terminal 3 will be the future main terminal of Frankfurt Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Premium wifi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Air Base Airport is used for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
